title: S3cco
author: S3cco
content: MetaVentures Bangkok | December 14-15, 2022 | Bangkok, ThailandEvent Website: https://metaventures.global/The "MetaVentures" summit creates a bridge connecting the world's Blockchain leaders with the professional communityin Southeast Asia. It is a unique event where you can immerse yourself in the unforgettable atmosphere of investments, Metaverse, Digital Art and NFTs, keep up with the latest developments in the world of digital assets, decentralized finance, DAOs, different types of Blockchains, tokens, DAOs.An investment-focused program that will bring together international business leaders, government, investors, technicians and developers to discuss the most interesting investment opportunities and innovations in the Web3/Metaverse world. You will also learn how NFT, together with cryptocurrencies, are creating a new global economy and how Metaverse/WEB3 developments are changing the world.
